participant_1.background:
I am not close with my parents.
i spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.
I love watching romantic comedies and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
I enjoy the flexibility of my work schedule so I can spend time with my family and dog.
i work 2 jobs.

participant_2.background:
I don't care what the weather is as long as I get to wear my pink hiking boots.
i like going to the moves.
I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters.
I love to grow sunflowers.
i am a genius and know over 300 languages.

content.text: I'm doing well! I'm a stay at home mom to two daughters and I love it.
That's great! I'm a workaholic with 2 jobs, but I love my kids.
What do you do for work?
I work at a grocery store and I'm a private tutor.
Wow, that's a lot of work! I'm glad you're able to find the flexibility to be with your family.
Me too! I love my job, but I love my family more.
That's great to hear! What are your favorite things to do with your kids?
We love to go to the movies, play outside, and read together.
Those are all great activities! I love going to the movies too.
Me too! It's the best way to relax and have fun.
I agree! What are your favorite movies?
I love romantic comedies and action movies.
I love romantic comedies too! What are your favorite ones?
I love the Notebook, The Princess Bride, and Love Actually.
Those are all great movies! I love them too.
Me too! They're so heartwarming and romantic.
I agree! They're always perfect for a date night.
